content: more info * access your exclusive members-only web site 24/7 you ll always have something new and exciting to knit * get personal expert advice from me on your knitting questions sweaterbabe is your knitting coach *** win a free pattern of your choosing *** submit a photo of any sweaterbabe com finished pattern on a person and email it to gallery@sweaterbabe com if your photos are chosen for use you earn a free pattern details at sweaterbabe com crochet hat measurements and assembly diagram y page 6 of 6 swb-c00058 y  copyright sweaterbabe com all rights reserved worldwide sweaterbabe com has made every effort to be accurate and complete with our patterns they are provided strictly as is we are not responsible for differences between knitters knitting mistakes or any typographical errors our patterns are authorized for home knitting use only and are not to be knit for resale sweaterbabe com patterns may not be photocopied or distributed in any hardcopy or electronic form without the express written consent of sweaterbabe com
